title: 000 : Magnemite, Magmar
author: Chris Taylor
description:
In the inaugural episode of Magmar Sucks – the Ranking of Pokemon we begin our epic journey through the Pokedex whilst comparing the two Pokemon that started it all – Magnemite, a dope f@#$ing magnet and Magmar, the one that sucks.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode: [Magnemite](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Magnemite_(Pok%C3%A9mon)), [Magmar](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Magmar)
